Have you ever dreamed of a world where everyone speaks only one language? About a world where everyone has a specific role and knows what they're doing? Have you dreamed of a great community and wonderful experiences? Have you been waiting for wonderful moments? Well ... If you were looking for it then you only found a common language. The game is dominated by gentlemen like сука блять! A bunch of cheaters at all ranks, and if you find ordinary players, I assume that they will "rash" B anyway. Despite this wonderful atmosphere, CS: GO has its own atmosphere, a tactical game that requires thinking and cooperation with a group. Sometimes it's nice to play a few matches, talk to the world's elite, or learn a few new words in foreign languages. I heartily recommend.
